title: Any open land or lands of closed Industrial unit/ units in the Industrial Zone (Excluding the leased out plots by NIT / NMC) may be permitted to be utilized for all the users permissible in the Residential zone with permissible FSI in Residential Zone, subject to payment of premium to be paid equal to 15% of the rate of developed land as given in the Annual Statement of Rates published by IGR every year
clause_text: Any open land or lands of closed Industrial unit/ units in the Industrial Zone (Excluding the leased out plots by NIT / NMC) may be permitted to be utilized for all the users permissible in the Residential zone with permissible FSI in Residential Zone, subject to payment of premium to be paid equal to 15% of the rate of developed land as given in the Annual Statement of Rates published by IGR every year.
